Looking for an Acura MDX near Washington?

The Acura MDX has a reputation for reliability and strong resale that ensures high marks for customer satisfaction and repeat patronage, but even first-time buyers will be impressed by what the MDX has to offer. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect MDX for you.

Autotrader has 1,027 Acura MDXs for sale near Washington, DC, including a Used 2011 Acura MDX, a Used 2011 Acura MDX SH-AWD, and a Used 2011 Acura MDX w/ Advance & Entertainment.
